main event: A civilian reported an unidentified flying object sighting near Westcliffe, Colorado on August 12, 1957, observed for about 1 hour.
interesting points: The object was larger than a car but smaller than a house,The object was described as circular and yellow with a shiny appearance,The observer and three other people saw the object from a distance of approximately 3/4 mile,The object was reported sitting in a clearing on four legs,The conclusion stated that there was insufficient data to classify the sighting properly
witness description: a civilian and three other individuals in the party
